ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Sorry for the foul comment
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry about that.  Obviously none of us knew that.  As far as why i said it, partially was in a bad mood and partially because my impression of your posts is
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry about that. Obviously none of us knew that. As far as why i said it,
partially was in a bad mood and partially because my impression of your
posts is that you only reply when you are disagreeing with someone, and seem
to always mention how long you've been playing and that you were a guide. i
like hearing your opinions, but sometimes you make them sound more fact that
what they really are. Anyway you don't need to apologize, but i do, and i'm
sorry.

Shada

> I'm sorry for the foul language in my last post but that
> comment by Shada
> and Blitz Krieg just really hurt. I hope you can understand.
> It's not
> _just_ a game when real people's feelings are involved.
